key.name: server-auto-retrieve
key.description: Whether or not keys should be automatically retrieved from key servers.

key.name: server-auto-publish
key.description: Whether or not modified keys should be automatically published.

key.name: server-publish-to
key.summary: Publish keys to this key server
key.description: The key server to publish PGP keys to. Or empty to suppress publishing of PGP keys.

key.name: last-search-text
key.description: The last search pattern searched for against a key server.

key.name: last-search-servers
key.description: The last key server a search was performed against or empty for all key servers.
